name: MAGNUS THE MAGNET
description:
Play as Magnus the Magnet and use your attractive powers to solve puzzles and jump and run your way through a semi big 3D world to collect all of the 30 screws. When you're stuck, try getting some help from the natives. They may be squares but they seem very nice!

This was my very first 3D project and also my first anticipation in a game jam. It was a ton of fun and I hope you all like my entry.

Also big thanks to Ronald Gerth for allowing me to use his voice and the audio from the YT video 'Snake Eggs Magnets Fun' in the Soundtrack of the game!

Also also the file size is 69mb so the game is pretty much perfect.
